_header: I made a likeness of myself
Subjects: occasional verse; schools/scholars; ages of man’s life
_description: Fragmentary beginning of a poem on age, a self-portrait (the artist possibly aged twelve?) — two couplets

CamPem307.Transcription:
I made a lykenes of my selueVn to þe sundry [mor?] age
                    tweleWherof þe ȝere In hys astateIs Made & stant vp on
                    debatefor…
